r.d: Implementation of SOAP protocol and services
r.n: * http protocol was not recognised in WSDL.php (Michele Manzato, Freddy Vulto) * optional parameters to specify cache use and liftime in WDSL (suggested by Michele Manzato). Constants are kept for Backward Compatibility * Error handling in Server::callMethod (patch by Pavel Marenyuk) * Conformance to standard, removing the trailing slash for HTTP binding (many people reported this) * Left out old 0.7.3 version number in 0.7.4
